Erik Silver

To Do App with self-destructing tasks

Overview

This To Do App is unique in that the tasks will disappear if they are not completed within seven days.

Components:

  1. A client side event handler that executes a callback when a metric is recorded
  2. An Angular model to capture displayable events
  3. A new state accessible in the navigation to view event results

Stack

  1. AngularJS
  2. Firebase

User Stories

  1. Enter tasks
  2. View active and complete tasks
  3. Delete incomplete tasks after seven days

Results

The To Do App was my first the first app I built and a good place to start to learn the basics of Angular and integrating a database, Firebase, in this case.

Powered by Jekyll and made with love.
